metadata.title: CVE-2019-20091 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1.0. There is a NULL pointerdereference in AP4_Descriptor::GetTag in mp42ts when called fromAP4_DecoderConfigDescriptor::GetDecoderSpecificInfoDescriptor inAp4DecoderConfigDescriptor.cpp.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
